annotation.abstractive: The sender has been asked to provide the form of the confirmation by Dake and Roni Cappadonna. The sender thinks this needs to be handle by Dale Neuner. He/She wants to know if they can confirm the information.

The author does not know much about the confirmation, so (s)he tells Brent to get Scott Neal or somebody else who knows about the confirmation form, to contact Dale Neuner, so that Dale can talk to Roni Cappadonna. Ronni wants the confirmation form. It is not clear if she can get a draft of the confirmation with the proposed deal terms, or if she needs to wait until the trade is done.

The Confirmation is the writing terms of the deals agreed by phone. Roni Cappadonna may be looking for a form of Confirmation not deal specific, or expect that they are doing a particular trade. The sender left them a voicemail asking for a request specification. The sender will give her what she needs, when she answers back.

The sender clarifies to Julian that the confirmation should be a written one with the terms of the agreed deal. It is not clear if they want to see a general form of confirmation, or how the confirmation might look like after a trade, or a confirmation for a trade that has been or is being proposed. The sender left Roni Cappadonna a voicemail asking her what specifically she was looking for. Julian can contact the sender if she has any questions.

The sender has created a subdirectory named Swaps containing two subdirectories under Current Forms and Old Forms to make it easier to find swaps forms. The forms like 2101a, 2101b have names like isda-multicurrency, isda-local currency, industrial-u.s. Also, he/she is moving forms frequently used into atty.fms bank. The forms should be available for users out Houston office. To U.K. and Singapore users the forms reviewed will be sent to you for review.

The sender talks about a form revision process in Houston office that replaces an old numerical naming system for forms with a more intuitive one. (S)he has moved approved swap forms and the frequently used forms located in different people's folders into the 'Swaps' subfolder in the attorney forms bank. This will give easier access to forms. U.K. and Singapore will receive clean and blacklined copies of the changes for review purposes.

A virus spread few hours ago, causing them to shut down all computers. The sender is working on listing system issues. He/She has a meeting with IPI to demostrate it to Global Contracts team leader, Confirm Desk financial trading head, and also Mark Taylor. The third paralegal is trained so he/she is getting down with the last contracts. The sender will finish a big project on Wednesday. Thursday he/she leaves for a two week vacation.

The sender has meeting with IPI next week to demonstrate their system to Global Contracts team leader, Confirm Desk financial trading head, and Mark Taylor. (S)he is working on a summary listing on system issues for Documentum, and has looked at the receiver's Micro Modeling material. (S)he has a big project ending on Wednesday, then (s)he is leaving for Germany for vacation for two weeks. (S)he may have some time for this project after that.

The sender is a Senior Legal looking for a software to help manage his/her physical and financial confirmation process and ISDA Master Agreements. He/She has found their company through the advice of a consultant and the Risk Magazine article, and he/she would like information of the services they provide and talk to them or a representative from their company.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: financial confirmation process and ISDA Master Agreements
talk to you or a representative
software systems that can help us manage our documentation

annotation.abstractive: The sender is a Houston-based Senior Legal Specialist in the Legal Dept of Enron, the largest integrated marketer of energy in the US. He wants software systems to manage documentation needs, and would like to obtain marketing material about the services the receiver's firm provides. The sender's phone number is 713-853-3399. He has come to know about the receiver's firm from a hired consultant, and from the January 1999 issue of Risk Magazine.

Here is the spreadsheet. Only trades done after 8/26/01 are considered, only North American gas products, all numbers are in USD. Since on Sep 25, only the spot trades done during Aug 27-30 actually roll off, there isn't much of a rolloff on that date. The first sheet is a summary, each column represents the net cash we owe to a particular customer. If 0 they owe them. The other two sheet are supporting data.

The sender discusses a spreadsheet with John. (S)he only considered trades after 8/26/01 and North American physical gas products (bid week started on 8/27/01). All numbers are in USD. 1.40 CAD/1 USD is used for Canadian trades. For index pricing, an index of 3 USD is used. The first sheet has the summary data. Each column represents the net cash the sender's firm owes a particular customer as of that date. Other two sheets are supporting data.

The sender has previously asked for access to Lotus Notes Master Swap Agreement Database for attorney Brent Hendry, and it has not been granted yet. He wants to know is needed to grant Henry and some other individuals access. Also they need to copy their database and set up a document tracking in Buenos Aires, the sender needs a contact for it.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: Lotus Notes Master Swap Agreement Database

annotation.abstractive: The sender wants Mike to give Brent Hendry, an attorney in the Buenos Aires office, access to their Lotus Notes Master Swap Agreement Database. Brent will also need additional attorneys added to the database, and will provide Mike with a list of any other individuals (Legal/Credit/Secretarial only) he would like granted access. Moreover, Brent would like to copy the database to set up a document tracking database in Buenos Aires.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: Lotus Notes Master Swap Agreement Database

annotation.abstractive: The sender is going to spend a holiday in Germany. He/she is going to Munich on the 27th and leaving from Amsterdam September 9. He/She will try to talk to the receiver next Monday while in the London office. He proposes to chat by phone.

The sender has planned a holiday in Germany, as (s)he mentioned earlier to Marcus when they were in New Orleans. (S)he will fly to Munich on August 27 and return from Amsterdam on September 9. The sender requests Marcus to spend a few minutes suggesting ideas to him/her on next Monday or Tuesday if he is in the office. The sender will be in the London office on those days. If Marcus is out next week, they can chat by phone tomorrow or Friday.

Your registration for the Traffic school To Go is done. We hope you complete the program. You will need to enter you information while logging back at: http://www.trafficschooltogo.com/students/. Use license state = California license number= N7889351. If any license information is entered with errors, use it as entered. Later you will be able to correct any mistake by following the "Personal Information" button on your "Student Control Panel". Our records have this mailing address as yours : 366 Dolores St., #3 San Francisco, CA 94110.

Jeffrey Dasovich's registration for the Traffic School To Go program has been recorded. If he needs help, he can reply to the e-mail or call. This is EXACTLY how he will re-enter his information when logging in to the program. If he makes an error entering his information, he can use the incorrect information to log in. Once logged in, he will have the option of correcting the error. The sender wants to confirm his mailing address.

The sender asked for a business contact to Richard Ramirez. Richard asked for a power enabling agreement, but the sender confirmed with Liz Sager they already have one. He/She manually sentcomments on Lotus Notes, there are changes undergoing Lotus Notes. Only Legal and Credit will access the comment section. The 'restriction' bar is going to be right after the name, and the online trading will include an approved or not drop down menu and a comment screen to keep track of online trading decisions.

Richard Ramirez does not know about a business contact, but he will get back to the sender. He works in Fuel and Energy Risk Management, and makes decisions about fuel purchases and derivatives hedging. Richard also wanted a power enabling agreement. Liz Sager says they already had a power trade on the books and except for authority issues, there is no reason not to do financial energy. The sender just sent the Lotus Notes comment manually.

In the chain of command in IT everyone responds to Phillipe Bibi. Mary Solmonson suggested Inja Chun or Chris Nehney for the Fishkin Project. They want to meet with Phillipe Bibi to make sure they get a good person assigned to the Fishkin Project. The sender will call Danny Clark to ask who is using Documentum at EES.

The sender spoke to Mary Solmonson about the chain of command in IT. Phillipe Bibi is the top boss. Michael Neves, the Lotus Notes contact, reports to Gary Bode, but Mary could not find Gary's boss on the chart. For the Fishkin Project, she suggested Inja Chun, a woman she says is very good, or Chris Behney. The sender will call Danny Clark to see who at EES is using Documentum to manage their documents. (S)he also suggests a meeting with Bibi.

The sender included the office's authority and incumbency for the U.S. master swap agreements. He/She also included this same changes to the Canadian form. He is asking the receiver to take a look and see if it can be approved. Nella will print the documents and give them to Peter.

The sender revised the incumbency certificates for their US master swap agreements to include the officer's authority and incumbency. (S)he made the same changes to the Canadian form as well, but does not want to make any final changes without Peter's approval. (S)he requests Peter to take a look at it when he is free, and asks Nella to print out the enclosed current form of certificate and the revised one for Peter.

They need to make EPGN Socal Ehrenberg and P G Topock restricted products to prohibit El Paso Mechant Energy from trading them, since they are refusing to trade with us on their online trading system, broker market and ICE. They want to keep the playing field level. The sender needs to make sure they can roll them out on eol by 2/28. any questions should be directed to Mike Grisby.

The 2 products are EPNG Socal Ehrenberg and PG E Topock. These will be restricted products so that El Paso Merchant Energy cannot trade them. They refused trade with the sender's company in the Western region, both on their online trading system, ICE, and also in the broker market. This product restriction will keep the playing field level. Further questions should be directed to Mike Grigsby, the VP. The product must be out on eol by 2/28.

I won't attend the forum. I have a suggestion to improve TAP's attractiveness. When a traveller is placed on "waiting list" the agency should check regularly and asked to be cleared from it, instead of waiting to be contacted by the provider because they will clear any person on the phone before anyone on the list. This was tested by myself and other agents.

The sender is traveling, so (s)he will not attend the forum. (S)he has a suggestion to make TAP more attractive. When a traveler is placed on a wait list, the agency should check back with the provider often to see if the wait can be cleared. According to TAP's policy, the agency waits for the provider. But then the provider will almost surely clear the person on the phone before anyone on the list. The sender stresses that the alternative works.

The conference was a success with the participation of 512 practitioners.I visited Alex at Carnegie Mellon. A PhD student of mine has tested the software and we are still ahead from what I saw in the conference I referee. I declined RISK. We should plan for Paris.

The sender apologizes to Vince for not contacting Karla earlier. Dauphine is not properly equipped yet. The conference was spectacular, with 512 academics and practitioners in College de France. The sender was tired afterwards, so did not go to Houston. (S)he visited Alex after the conference on Quantitative Risk Management at CMU. One of his/her former PhD students is testing and improving the software. (S)he declined RISK in Houston and NYC.

Regulatory Affairs aim to keep all your informed with Livelink. Livelink will include filings, maps, rate increases, etc. Is a web-based tool available from the Government Affairs homepage. We will have a meeting the 27th to discuss Livelink and what information is a valuable input for each team, to be included into the software.

Becky and the sender of Regulatory Affairs introduce Livelink, a web-based tool, in an effort to reduce paper usage. People can enter Livelink from the Govt. Affairs homepage. It will contain filings, maps, rate increases, etc. that are usually sent via interoffice mail. Files from the file room will be added as well. They will have a meeting on Wednesday the 17th to determine which files to put into Livelink, because not all files are relevant.

The sender is working on the online trading with Singapore. He/she needs guidance in the next matters. Should Singapore be approved for all types of trading? Are there counterparties we shouldn't approve for trading outside the governmental? Any product not approved for trading out of Singapore? Any type of reps we should include in the agreement?

The sender is working with Mark on approval of the counterparty lists for online trading. Mark asked him/her to contact the receiver on the approach they should take with respect to financial trading with Singapore counterparties. Should Singapore be approved for all types of trading with all types of counterparties, or are there special counterparties, special products or special types of reps they need to include in their agreements?

The state of incorporation is not being considered in our review. The biggest consideration with derivatives is the country of incorporation. The issue on approval of swap of trading is with governmentals, utilities, insurance companies, pension funds. Information that we don't have. Each utility need to be looked at individually to see which s law applies. Don't make general assumptions. Global Contracts Group is trying to capture information

Review of the counterparty list must consider the country and state of incorporation and the countries of trading. For the bulk of swap counterparties (energy companies), state law is not an issue in the approval of swap trading. It is more of an issue with governmentals, utilities, insurance companies, pension funds, etc. Each utility needs to be handled individually to see which state or federal law may apply. Mary Gosnell is the person.

The sender wants to find additional ways to contribute to the group during future stays in the London Office. Let the sender know If there are meetings outside the office where the sender could be of value. The sender is looking to the four of them for guidance, both as to where the sender can contribute and where the sender can't on the new role.

It was good to spend this visit exclusively in the office, but the sender wants to find additional ways to contribute to the group during his/her future stays in the London office. For example, (s)he could join meetings outside the office, with regulators or others. (S)he will try to give as much advance notice as possible of future stays in Europe, and will be looking to the four receivers for guidance as to where (s)he can or cannot contribute.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: future stays in the London office

annotation.abstractive: Mark needs a copy of one the letters sent to outside counsel requesting updates on their legal advice to deal with the online trading issues. They need to get similar letters out to some of the South American countries and Caribean tax shelter islands.

Mark asked the sender to contact the receiver to get a copy of one of the letters they sent to outside counsel requesting updates on their legal advice to deal with the online trading issues. They need similar letters out to some of the South American countries and Caribbean tax shelter islands. The sender thanks the receiver and asks if (s)he had a good time in his/her vacation.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: copy of one of the letters

annotation.abstractive: The sender is asking for detailed information to promote the recipient's marketing presentation. With this information along with the resume and verbal input, they are working to find the best position for the recipient. They mention that their credibility has grown with every placement they accomplished. They asked for a list of 12 target companies and 12 references. They are open to any clarification.

Jeff appreciates how Chris let them help him out in preparing for his life after Enron, and explains that the reason they ask for such detail in the forms is that this information, along with his resume and any verbal help, will help them prepare a marketing presentation for whichever suitors Chris chooses. It will create a bidding war for his services. Chris should also put together a list of companies he likes and a list of 12 references.

Tom Martin and Jim Schwieger are looking for a Carthage Hub. Tom is talking to Lavorato about it. With the HPL sale, their physical guys have to be flat daily causing the sender to chunckle on the inside. The sender thanks his boss for being understanding in the situation. The sender is confident to be successful in the future. The sender announces that by the end of the week a final decision will be made.

The sender had two very positive meetings with Tom Martin and Jim Schwieger, both looking for a Carthage Hub physical trader. Tom is planning on talking to Lavorato to discuss the details. (S)he appreciates Doug's support, and does not hold the fact that (s)he could not take a look at the ST-ERCOT book, against Doug or the management, because it is same as trading. (S)he is confident that wherever (s)he ends up (s)he will be successful.

Daniel is in charge of the lunches. He prepares spreadsheets which shows the total amounts, and how much each cost center is charged. He did not prepare them for August and September. The sender thought it can be figure it out from what's been charged to the cost center. But, it was difficult to make lunch-invoice correspondence. So , the sender prepared a spreadsheet by averaging what was charged on June and July. Tips and delivery were included

Daniel, in-charge of the lunches, is yet to prepare the monthly spreadsheets for August and September with the total amounts per day and how much each cost center is charged. He came up with a percentage according to how many people he ordered for and how many people are in each group, and then he charged each cost center accordingly. The 2 worksheets for June and July are attached. The sender made a spreadsheet that (s)he will discuss tomorrow.

Enron Management Conference will be held Wednesday through Friday, November 14-16, 2001, in San Antonio, Texas. They have a great program for this year's conference. General Norman Schwarzkopf will join as a keynote speaker on leadership. Gary Hamel is back in the company and will help them process the past year and prepare for future success. The event is fitting to bring Enron's leaders together. They will define Enron's character and destiny.

The Enron Management Conference will be held Wednesday through Friday, November 14-16, 2001, at the Westin La Cantera Resort in San Antonio, Texas. General Norman Schwarzkopf will be a keynote speaker on leadership. Gary Hamel will help process the past year and prepare for future success. Enron will look into the future, and embrace the many exciting things in store for them. The sender urges people to attend this very important meeting.

The new ISDA Master Agreements between ECT and ECT Canada and PG E Energy Trading Gas Corporation and PG E Energy Trading, Canada Corporation. They will be issuing a new umbrella guarantees. It will cover physical, financial and power transactions. The sender sent them the original Enron Corp. Guaranty for $105,000,000 and have received in of the PG E Corporation Guaranty for $100,000,000. They want to raise the Enron Corp to $110mm.

As a result of the new ISDA Master Agreements between ECT, ECT Canada, PG E Energy Trading Gas Corporation, and PG E Energy Trading Canada Corporation, a set of new 'umbrella' guarantees is initiated that will cover all physical, financial and power transactions. Originals of the following guarantees need to be returned: PG E Corporation Guarantees dated 03/28/1998 and 06/05/1998, and PG E Energy Trading Corporation Guarantee dated 03/11/1997.

Today's simulation has been postponed to next Wednesday. There is no access to systems through the web. They can only get access through Enron intranet. Arrangements can be made to see it. Otherwise they will inform when they roll it out onto the web.

Today's simulation has been postponed until next Wednesday. They are yet to open the system to the Web, so the receiver will need to be on the Enron Intranet to get access. The sender might be able to arrange something for the receiver in their NY office (midtown). Otherwise, (s)he will let the receiver know when the system is rolled out onto the Web.

They want to create a new product name: EPGN SoCal Ehr. It should be under the product type US Gas Phy. The description should contain the same language as the EPNG SoCal Topk product except the word 'Ehrenberg' should be substituted every time the word 'Topock' appears. They need to change the description of the current NGI SoCal index product to allow for the addition of the specific point name to create a physical index products.

The sender informs Melba that they are creating a new product with the product name "EPNG SoCal Ehr". It should be used under product type "US Gas Phy". The description should use the same language as the EPNG SoCal Topk product except that the word 'Topock' should be replaced by the word 'Ehrenberg' everywhere. They would also like to create physical index products for this trading point, but they need to change the short description.

In order to account for the same day change at Katy, 7/24/00 only. At Exxon Katy (Mtr 4132): Allocate -0- to deal 284599 Allocated 4,500 to deal 339604. At Lone Star Katy (Mtr 67):Allocate 5,000 to deal 341801(new deal) Allocate 5,500 to deal 341808 (new deal) EOL deals are firm. Location, volume, or price cannot be changed on these deals. if there is questions make sure that your audience knows that they are discussing an EOL trade.

In order to account for the same day change at Katy, the following deals are to be scheduled for 7/24/00 only: at Exxon Katy (Mtr 4132), 0 to deal 284599 and 4500 to deal 339604; at Lone Star Katy (Mtr 67), 5000 to deal 341801 and 5500 to deal 341808. EOL deals are firm. The location, volume, or price on these deals cannot be changed. If questions arise on an EOL deal, the receiver should make sure his/her audience knows it is an EOL trade.

This waiver has to deal with a provision on the ECT master swap agreement. It requires to be kept confidential. Duke Energy wants to copy the terms of the master agreement used for ECT and use it for Duke Energy International in Argentina. Duke Energy cannot provide a copy to Duke Energy International unless it gets ECT's permission. The sender is trying to resolve the issue of Duke Energy International to have right to look at the agreement.

This waiver has to deal with a provision in the ECT master swap agreement that requires that the agreement be kept confidential, except to certain people like auditors. It does not allow the agreement to be provided to affiliates. Duke wants to copy the terms of the master agreement it has in place with ECT and use it for Duke Energy International that is doing the deal in Argentina. The sender is trying to resolve this issue.

Lower Colorado River authority called to asked to put a power enabling and ISDA Master Agreement in place with them. Liz Sager says that a physical trade was done before with them. A financial trading can still be done. The sender will mail a package of information on online trading to the Lower Colorado River authority.

Lower Colorado River Authority asked the sender today if they could put a power enabling and ISDA Master Agreement in place. The sender spoke to Liz Sager and it appears there already was a physical power trade with them. But financial trading cannot be done until all steps are completed. Lower Colorado River Authority wanted some information on online trading and the sender wants to send them a packet. (S)he provided their address.

Mark is the lead attorney of the new web-based commodity trading system project. In the project, Mark and the sender are currently designing the swap jurisdictional database in Lotus Notes format. This would be the database for foreign derivatives laws, ISDA opinions and the like. Also, The sender went to a class on Project Management. Out of that the sender is reviewing the project goals, objectives. Defining and redefining what they want.

The sender is talking about another big project he has been a part of. Mark Taylor was the host of this year's ECT Legal Conference, and he is also the lead attorney on that project. The sender, besides being Mark's aide-de-camp on EOL, is working on counterparty approval lists for the financial contracts. He recently went to an internal class on Project Management. Mark and he are designing the swap jurisdictional database in Lotus Notes format.

If a master agreement is in force, the master controls the transaction. However is not how it was intended by the commercial people. They want every particular product to be trade with a single Enron entity. The suggestion is to revised long descriptions and state the Enron trading entity for each product type. It should please the commercial and tax people. Any thoughts from the legal side?

The current ETA draft says that if a master agreement is in force covering a particular transaction, the master controls. But it does not adequately cover the multiple Enron entity issue. The commercial people want every trade for a particular product to be with a single Enron entity. The sender suggests a solution, and asks for legal help. The solution is to revise long descriptions to state the Enron trading entity for each product type.

Coral transacted on EOL. They selected a july thru October deal by mistake. They agreed to let them out of the deal, which resulted in the creation of a second deal in EOL. Coral is not reporting anything on the deal. But, since EOL deals are automatically processed. They cannot kill the deal. Logistics will be brokering the transactions in MOPS. Make sure Coral is not invoiced or paid on these deals. The Sitara deals are: 287946 and 288653

Coral selected a July-October deal for a June EOL deal by mistake. When they were let out of the deal, it created a second deal. Coral will not report anything on the deal, because it was unwound. But since EOL deals are automatically processed and are firm transactions, the sender cannot kill it on their side, even though they net to zero volume and price. The sender wants to make sure Coral is not invoiced or paid on these deals.

The sender have Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of Enron North America Corp appointing Dale Neuner and Robert Shults as gents and attorneys-in-fact to execute Password Applications. The original Consent will be sent to Kate Cole for inclusion in the corporate minute book and copies will be sent to Dale and Bob. When signing the Password Applications, Dale and Bob should sign them as 'Agent and Attorney-in-Fact'.

The sender received the Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of Enron North America Corp. dated 11/10/99 appointing Dale Neuner and Robert Shults as agent and attorney-in-fact to execute Password Applications on behalf of the Company. The original Consent will be sent to Kate Cole for inclusion in the corporate minute book and copies will be sent to Dale and Bob. If Dale and Bob are absent, any V.P. can sign Password Applications.

The sender changed the FTS monthly amount from $1,065 to $715. Effective on Feb 20th. The amount transferred to account 586-61L86 needs to be changed from $150 to $175 and to account 586-61M19 from $175 to $200. The sender also submitted a transfer of $1,000 into his CMA account. Also, $500 needs to be transferred into the account 586-94017 and account 586-94019. The sender will need a 1099-R for the transactions.

The sender changed the FTS monthly amount from $1065 to $715 as discussed with Jay. It is effective Feb 20th. The amount transferred to account 586-61L86 will change from $150 to $175 and to account 586-61M19 from $175 to $200. The sender submitted a transfer of $1000 into his/her CMA account. (S)he would like to transfer $500 each into accounts 586-94017 and 586-94019, which is his/her 2001 contribution to the Education IRA's.

The sender is trying to sell 10,000/d off Blk Marlin into Carbide. Jody was a pass on HSC - $0.03 because of other gas he has flowing which he now indicates is showing up at HSC - $0.04 to $0.05. Nelson hasn't confirmed price to me but the best I've heard from him was a HSC - $0.04. Our last shot for Nov Dec is Monday. After that, we have a shot at gas that comes up Jan 01. he seems to be expecting HSC - $0.10 to $0.12

The sender is trying to sell 10000/d off Blk Marlin into Carbide for Nov Dec 01. Nelson has not confirmed his price, but the best he has is a HSC - $0.04. He wants to better Spinniker's price. The last shot for Nov Dec is Monday. After that, there is gas coming up on Jan 01 at TX City. Jody still wants to see a delivered price off of MOPS. He seems to be expecting HSC - $0.10 to $0.12 based on gas he is buying at El Paso Blessing.

Jeff McMahon was presented as Enron's chief financial officer. This move was required to restore investor confidence and stop the continuing in our share price . Jeff has unparalleled qualifications and a deep and thorough understanding of Enron. He work in important positions in Enron's Europe Operations as well as in US. In 2000, he was named president and chief operating officer of Enron Net Works. Appointing Jeff as CFO is one important step.

Jeff McMahon is appointed as Enron's chief financial officer to restore investor confidence. Jeff has unparalleled qualifications and a deep and thorough understanding of Enron. He had been serving as chairman and CEO of Enron Industrial Markets. In 2000, he was named president and chief operating officer of Enron Net Works. Jeff is working hard to battle the continuing decline in Enron's share price. But the real solution lies in hard work.

This year's Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation (JDRF) walk is schedule for October 28th at Greenspoint Mall. The theme is "Mission: Possible". The team leader, who is a insulin dependent diabetic is encouraging people to volunteer for the cause. Enron's goal for the year is $400,000. JDFR money goes directly to research. Insulin shots are only a life support system not a cure. To be a volunteer or a team leader people may contact the sender.

The sender will lead the Enron team in this year's Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation (JDRF) Walk on Sunday, October 28, at Greenspoint Mall. (S)he is a diabetic, describes the horrors of this disease, and mentions Enron's goal this year of raising $400K. Enron has been the number 1 walk team for 6 years in a row. The Walk's theme this year is 'Mission: Possible'. Last year's Walk had 600 participants. The sender looks for people's support.

Mark look at Pete's termination he thought it looked fine. Mark liked it and the form is been changed. When the termination was drafted, the New York law was also checked. The sender will be out for a week but can be reached through his cell phone that will be answered by his assistant. Mark will have an international cell phone.

Mark looked at Peter's termination and thought it looked fine. He actually liked Peter's termination and release better than the language in the form, so the form will change. The sender checked the New York law when (s)he drafted the termination, so that is fine. (S)he will be out all next week because his/her Mom is visiting him/her for the Thanksgiving holiday. Mark will also be out next week, so the sender suggests contacting Taffy instead.

An amendment to the referenced executed ISDA Master was sent by Susan Bailey to the Counterparty. It provides for an increase in the Counterparty Exposure Threshold from U.S. $3,000,000 to U.S. $5,000,000 and amends one of the MAC provisions. Some changes are being mane to the agreement. This amendment has not been executed. Credit in the agreement not being amended includes 3rd party debt and MAC for ECT Canada tied to a dro.

An amendment to the executed ISDA Master was sent by Susan Bailey to the Counterparty on 11/23/99. This amendment provides for an increase in the Counterparty Exposure Threshold from $3M to $5M, and amends a MAC provision for Counterparty by increasing Counterparty's Net Worth. There are certain other changes as well. This amendment has not been executed. No changes are made to the MAC if Counterparty's Funded Debt is more than its Net Worth.

DETM is hiring people for SCL. The sender wants to know If there is any Enron's employee willing to relocate there. They are looking for senior-level traders (physical, forward financial and options) with 3-7 years of experience, middle office risk management (modeling, forecasting, hedging, portfolio analysis).. They are looking to grow their business in the West. Please pass along this information.

DETM is looking to add more staff in SLC. They want good Enron talents who are willing to relocate. The openings are for senior-level traders (physical, forward financial and options) with 3-7 years of experience, and middle office risk management personnel (modeling, forecasting, hedging, portfolio analysis). They may also have a few upper level positions to be posted in the next few months. They are growing their business in the West.

Esther receives trip schedule for Gary. The departing flight number is #1668 at 11:30am on Friday. The return flight number is #1663. Both flight are Continental. There are flight at 1:30 and 3:30 as well. Gary can take any flight. The sender may probably take a later flight on Friday. Gary may join whenever he likes

Gary asked the sender to send some business trip information to Esther. Enron employees will be leaving at 11:30 AM on Continental flight #1668 from Bush International on Friday 8/4/00. The return flight from Tampa, Continental #1663, will leave at 3:20 PM on Sunday, arriving Houston at 4:29 PM. There are a few later flights on Friday if Gary needs to come later. The sender will probably have to catch one of the later ones.

The sender is faxing Master Firm Purchase/Sale Agreement executed between ETC and Utilicorp. Utilicorp signed the agreement instead of giving a guaranty. They signed accepting joint and several liability with the respect to the obligations. If ECT can get this new company agree to the same terms as Utilicorp did. This will be as good or better than getting a guaranty. US and UK laws differences must be considered under the new master agreement.

The Master Firm Purchase/Sale Agreement executed between Enron Gas Marketing (merged now into ECT) and Aquila Energy Marketing Corporation (merged now into Utilicorp.) has Utilicorp. 'signing' the agreement in lieu of giving a guaranty. Utilicorp. actually signed as a co-obligor under the agreement. They should be made to use the same language in the master agreement as Enron (subject to US and UK laws), because anything less might be worthless.

The sender wants to sit with Mark on Monday morning to go over a spreadsheet. He/she has some comments on the financial transactions and also has some questions from the items that he/she wasn't capable to understand. The sender is particularly concerned about the Weather Products generally and the Floating Prices for all financial products. He/she needs to have this to be done before leaving taking a trip mid-afternoon.

The sender wants to sit down with Mark Monday morning (10:30 AM) to go over the spreadsheet. (S)he has a few comments on the financial transaction items (s)he understood and several questions on areas (s)he did not understand yet. (S)he is particularly concerned about the Weather Products and the Floating Prices for all financial products (the Index tab). He wants to get it wrapped up by Monday mid-afternoon, and then he will leave town.

The sender has some thoughts to his future visit to Houston both business and personal. Business: Key functions and list of people? Immediate Priorities? Cost structure? project execution? Objectives for 2002? Reporting structure, Management Committee? Belden or other structure. Personal: risk of moving to Houston, bonus, prepaid relocation or bridge loan, relocation package including buying house, house rental?, family unit.

The sender discusses business and personal issues with John. Regarding business, (s)he wants to know key functions, list of people, immediate priorities, objectives for 2002, reporting structure, book ownership, management committee, and how to figure out west power, among others. Regarding personal issues, (s)he asks how to deal with moving family to Houston in current situation, bonus, bridge loan, buying a house vs house rental, etc.

There is a special language used to clarify on the PG E Topock product. The volumes scheduled to be delivered are subject to reductions due to normal operational constraints on all interconnecting pipelines at this location. The reductions caused by these are excused nonperformance and are not considered a failure. Don't mention el paso pipeline because the gas can come from a variety of different pipelines.

The new index description for Socal Ehrenberg is "NGI SoBord Scal Ehr", and for Socal Topock is "NGI SoBord Scal Top". Some special language needs to be used on the PG E Topock product. The sender states that special language, and mentions that since it is close enough to the original language, it should not cause any problem. (S)he further warns not to specifically mention the El Paso pipeline, as the gas can come from many different pipelines.

The sender and Mark are getting the new jurisdictional database done. They are planning to finalize their recommendations soon and get the project to Haedicke to approval. The Online trading project is release today to the customers. There is no way to tell if any problems will arise.

The sender will distribute the receiver's article to their group and Credit. With Online Trading slowing down, Mark and (s)he finally focused on 'Project Fishkin'. (S)he is developing a new jurisdictional database to keep track of swap laws around the world. Having finalized their recommendations soon, they will show the project to Haedicke for his approval. Online trading goes live today to the customers, so there will probably be many problems.

The sender is concern about the buybacks and swing set up date. These should be set up for Friday the 7th. Six days of flow. The setting up should be sooner if possible to minimize economic impact. The Industrial spreadsheet should be functional, is beneficial to Gas Control, industrial traders and schedulers.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: buybacks and swings be set up

annotation.abstractive: Since the long weekend is coming up, the sender is concerned when the buybacks and swings will be set up for July. (S)he recalls the agreed date to be the 3rd work day, which is Friday the 7th. (S)he thinks delaying this any further will not help minimize their economic impact. Additionally, they need to get the Industrial spreadsheet up and running again. This report is very beneficial to Gas Control, industrial traders and schedulers on call.

The sender is wondering why math majors are not included Enron's recruiting majors list. He/she thinks that math majors have many or the same skills that can be used in some other areas. Since Texas A M Career Center just filters out the people by the list of majors, all math majors are currently unavailable to sing up for interviews. This lead math majors to think that there is no place for them in big corporations like Enron.

During a Texas A M recruiting meeting the sender came to know that Enron does not have Math majors in their list, and was told that there was no business need for Math majors. The sender opines that Math majors have many of the same skills as Finance majors, and can easily adjust to accounting rotations. Moreover, they are a very talented pool of people. (S)he tried convincing, unsuccessfully, a manager in the A A program to consider Math majors.

EnronExec is a initiative to create a fee-for-service 'executive services' business. It will work with potentially rewarding companies without investing Enron's capital. The main contact Bill Gartland is seeking management and financial expertise. Through his contacts people from Special Assets will participate in a couple of meetings with some important Spain companies. As a byproduct they may identified some synergies and business for Enron.

Bill Gartland, a Houston entrepreneur with extensive contacts with national and provincial governmental development agencies in Spain, is seeking management and financial expertise to promote industrial, commercial and real estate projects in Spain. As a result, Enron is scheduled to meet with SEPI, INFO and other contacts in Spain the week of June 11. These initial meetings are informational and relationship focused. No commitments will be made.

Michel Salinas is planning the Christmas Card Signing Party. It is going to be at Cabo's on December 3rd. The sender is assuming that they are going to split the costs but he/she is not sure about it. The total estimated by Michael is $1000. Making their half $500. There are some customers (for the trading side) that need to be included to receive Christmas cards.

Michael Salinas is planning the Christmas Card Signing Party at Cabo's on this Monday, December 3 at 5:00. The sender and Tom should split the cost between them, and according to Michael's estimate, the total cost is $1000, making Tom's half $500 and the sender's half $500. The sender requests Tom's opinion in this regard, and asks if there are any customers from the trading side that should be included to receive Christmas cards.

The sender is looking for new challenges and professional opportunities. He is asking Vincent to let him know if there is an job opportunity around him at Enron Corporation. He/she has a Ph.D. in mathematics from MIT under Nobel Laureate in Economics. Besides, he/she suggest that his/her stronger asset is his/her intellectual capital and ability to look from new angles into complex issues. All of these alongside with his/her working experience.

The sender has a Ph.D. in Mathematics from MIT, studied under Economics Nobel Laureate Bob Merton, and would like to apply his/her knowledge of capital markets, trading and research in the field of energy markets. (S)he worked in companies like Goldman, John Meriwether group at Salomon Brothers, the European interest options desk at DKBI, London, and managed a small hedge fund. (S)he asks Vincent for an opportunity at Enron.

The sender copied a link from Netscape and paste it into his/her email system to make the link work. He/ She is leaving for a conference in Houston and will not be back before leaving to NY. Any contact may be through emal.

The sender laments that (s)he could not do the link (because copying from Netscape and pasting it into the email does the trick), but takes pride on BVI Weather. (S)he is leaving for a conference in Houston and may not be back in the office before leaving for NY. (S)he has his/her computer with him/her, but will not access e-mail on the road. Telephone is the surest way to reach him/her. (S)he checks text messages at the office fairly often.

The sender created deal 51435 to capture the $.04 agency fee for the Tenaska deal. It will have zero volume and zero commodity price with a demand charge of $.04 on 45,000/day. This will allow the demand charge to flow through the system. For Sep and Oct, someone in Volume Management need to create an accounting arrangement for this deal. With the actuals, the sender can change the demand charge with the volumes provided by Megan

The sender has created deal 514353 with 0 volume, 0 commodity price, and a demand charge of $0.04 on 45000/day, to capture the $0.04 agency fee for the Tenaska deal. Mark McCoy will schedule this deal as a zero nom. It will hopefully allow the demand charge to flow through the system. For Sep and Oct, Megan will get someone in Volume Management to create an accounting arrangement for this deal, pathed to the imbalance pool.

The sender is asking a complete list of Enserch entities to proceed with a check on legal names. This list containing entities with trading interest and possible business would be helpful Legal, Confirm and Others (settlements, Global Contracts, misc). Stop people from asking constantly.

The sender wants a complete list of the Enserch entities they wish to trade with from the receiver, so that (s)he can run that list by Enserch and check on the legal names. (S)he thinks it would help their full distribution (Legal, Confirm and Others), if the receiver could distribute a full list of the Enserch entities they want to continue trading with and what businesses are generated out of each entity. That will also stop people coming back.

Consider the rule that for all products that Credit has approved to our physical counterparties Financial will approved them too unless specifically mention. AEC Storage and Hub Services, bad name. Ashland Inc. will be approved under this name. Bayer Inc., bad name. Coast Energy group approved under Cornerstone Propane. Southwestern Energy Company is approved under that name. Tenaska Marketing Canada, bad name, need to be fixed to TMV Corp.

Unless otherwise noted on a going forward basis, and unless the sender specifically mentions a physical product, all physical counterparties will be approved for all the products that Credit has approved them for. If the sender has an exception, it will be noted. (S)he has attached comments, most of which are related to financial counterparties. (S)he did not respond to Credits-declined counterparties, and gave comments on 8 other counterparties.

The sender is telling the recipient about his/her friend that lives in London. Apparently, he is fine. He and Sue are getting ready to buy a new house on the river in Twickenham. He also has been traveling a lot. The sender also ran into Gaffer who is being traveling a lot. He looks like to be a door to door salesman because his traveling schedule. The recipient has a new lawyer.

The sender will get Lavo's title changed. (S)he spoke to their friend in London this morning. He is doing wonderful, is buying a new house with Sue in Twickenham with four bedrooms and a garage, has been traveling a lot, going to weddings almost every weekend for months, and rowing. The sender met Gaffer after many months. His traveling schedule shows that he is actually hired as a door to door salesman. The receiver's new lawyer has started.

The sender denotes the following: 1) Elizabeth Shim is getting pretty negative feedback in her logistics rotation. The sender is suggesting to relocate her out of Trading Track or fired her. 2) A London analyst is to find a position in the US. He has ranked well. The sender wants to have him screened by two traders and interviewed on November 1st. 3) Emil Carlson is in Stockholm. The sender suggest the recipient to contact him by mail.

Elizabeth Shim has performed poorly in two of her most recent logistics rotations. She should either be rotated out of the Trading Track formally, or should be transferred. A London analyst (resume attached) wants to come to the US, has ranked well, and is currently in EBS. The sender wants him screened by telephone by two traders along with everyone else on November 1. Emil Carlson is in Stockholm and the receiver may want to drop him a line.

The sender is asking Mark´s opinion, regarding the language used in the Canadian ISDA Agreements. The sender wants to know if they need a general statement establishing that the interest rate shall not exceed the maximum non'usurious rate and interest shall be paid on the actual number of days elapsed.

Mark asked the sender to get the receiver's input on a Canadian form question. The sender highlighted some language in the "Limitation of Rate" part of Canadian ISDA Agreements. (S)he asks if the highlighted part needs to be exactly as it is now, or if it can be replaced with a general statement to the effect that the interest rate shall not exceed the maximum non-usurious rate and that interest shall be paid on the actual number of days elapsed.

The sender is talking about popular book that both are currently reading. The New York Times gave that book an outstanding review. That is the reason for being sold out for a long time. Also, the sender has a friend in Canada. He working on a master physical/financial netting agreement for a Canadian counterparty. He has been calling the sender to ask basic ISDA questions that the friend should have learned in his/her class.

The sender is happy about the coincidence on a particular book, and suggests sharing thoughts with the receiver about it. The New York Times gave the book a rave review, which made it so popular that it was sold out for quite some time. The sender has a friend in Canada, who is working on a master physical/financial netting agreement for a Canadian counterparty, and is calling the sender to ask basic ISDA questions (s)he already covered in class.

The sender reports to B having some issues while trying to recruit Liz Bellamy. She had one interview with Steve Venturatos, and she is scheduled to have more with Dave Baumbach. Pat Clynes notice what was going on while the sender was out of the office. Toni and the sender communicate a couple of times, she is awaiting for a decision on salary.

The sender talks about some problems (s)he is having with the recruiting process. Toni is apparently responsible. She was at first not very responsive to calls and voice mails, but has improved over the last week. She has called the sender a few times awaiting his/her decision on salary concerns. But otherwise, the sender has had limited interaction with recruiting, which (s)he resents. (S)he describes an incident with Liz Bellamy as example.

The sender is asking to locate and sent to her the presentation that Paul did on European markets, because she is preparing one on global energy markets. Some slides may be pull in. She hopes that the receiver was able to go home at decent hours and is doing ok.

The sender is helping Alan Aronowitz out with a presentation he has to give on global energy markets. Paul recently did a presentation and there are some good slides on the European markets that (s)he wants to pull in. (S)he requests the receiver to locate, or get someone to locate, Paul's presentation, and email it to him/her. (S)he further suggests the receiver can use a beer with all the late nights (s)he has been putting in.

The sender is encouraging his friends and family to take part, support and donate to the Isuzu MS 150 Bike Tour. The funds raised provided support to people diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis and their families. His wife Ilene was diagnosed 3 years ago. Since then he has participated in the bike tour raising 6000$ on 1998, 10000$ on 1999. His goal for 2000 is 20000$. Enron will match dollar on dollar on all contributions donated in his name.

MS 150 is a two day bike tour on April 15 and 16 from Houston to Austin covering 182 miles dedicated to end the devastating effects of multiple sclerosis (MS). The sender's wife Ilene was diagnosed with MS three years ago. This is their third year riding in MS 150. He raised $6K in 1998, $15K in 1999, and wants to raise $20K in 2000. Enron is a big supporter of MS 150. The sender requests people to make a tax-deductible donation on a webpage.

The sender is responding a call made to Mark Taylor in Houston. Since Mark is in Germany fro a week. The sender is asking the receiver for the document that needs reviewing. When possible the documentabout US market descriptions will be run by Mark.

The receiver's call to Mark Taylor in Houston Legal was forwarded to the sender for response. Mark is on vacation in Germany until the end of next week. The sender just left Mark a voicemail on his cell phone, but (s)he is not sure if Mark will reply by tonight or not. (S)he therefore suggests the receiver email or fax his/her document/information need to him/her so that (s)he can run it by Mark as soon as (s)he hears back from him.

The sender is sending a revision on various points. The generic risk disclosure needs to be provided separately. Liters are rounding to 5 decimal places. Cross Default Threshold is at 150,000,000. Part 7 not completely accepted. The change in the Interest Rate definition is been verified. When finally is approved, Stephanie Panus will commence final version and sent it to Gaffney who is forwarding the paperwork to the receiver.

The sender comments on the final revisions. The generic risk disclosure must be in a separate cover. Cross Default Threshold is at 150M for all Enron parties. Part 7 revisions were not completely accepted for reasons that will be explained over phone. They are verifying their consent to the receiver's change in the Interest Rate definition. The receiver is requested to review collateral threshold to ensure it is as the credit departments agreed.

Anticipating the closure of UBSW Energy all employee's expenses should be filed through Enron's XMS system. Enron will pay all pre-closing expenses entered before closing. After transaction closing, payments will be sent. For all pre-closing expenses not submitted on time, a hard copy expense report will be needed and available at www.enron.com. More information will be sent in the next few days highlighting the Travel Entertainment policies.

In anticipation of the UBSW Energy transaction closing down, receivers are requested to file all their outstanding employee expenses to Enron's XMS system, and approvers are requested to approve these expense reports as soon as possible. Enron will process and pay all pre-closing expenses. If not completed this week, these expenses should be submitted on a hard copy expense report form available at www.enron.com. A series of e-mails will follow.

Enron Net Works and Enron Global Strategic Sourcing signed a two-year agreement with MCI as telecommunications provider. Beginning October 26th, to call Enron's Houston offices from abroad excluding Canada, dial the WorldPhone International Access number for the country where you are. The list of numbers is available at: http://home.enron.com:84/messaging/mciannounceme. Then dial 18009736766. Contact Tom Moore or Hasan Imam for any questions.

Enron Net Works (ENW) and Enron Global Strategic Sourcing (GSS) executed a two-year agreement making MCI WorldCom Enron's primary telecommunications provider. Beginning Friday October 26, 9 AM CST, the procedure for calling Enron's Houston offices from international locations, excluding Canada, will change. The new procedure is detailed in the email. Questions on commercial aspects of this agreement should be directed to Tom Moore.

The sender is working on the Merril/Belco assignment of trades. Fred has been executing assignments without Legal's initials. There exists two differences on the Merrill confirms: The Fallback Reference Price and settlement and/or payment dates. For the changed dates the sender asked Berenice to work with the business guy. If Sarah does'n know about the Fallback Reference Price changes they need to take that back to the dealmaker to sign off on.

The sender is working on the Merrill/Belco trade assignment with Sara. There seem to be two differences in the confirms Merrill sent. They added a Fallback Reference Price and changed the settlement and/or payment dates. Regarding the change in the settlement/payment dates, Bernice will get the business guy sign the transactions. If Sara does not know about the Fallback Reference Price, they will need to take that back to the dealmaker to sign.

Every employee of Enron is requested to help the computing environment stay virus-free. The recommendations is to avoid opening any email from a unknown sender and not to open/launch files either. A virus attack such as Melissa, ILOVEYOU, AnnaKournikova cost organizations billions of dollars, data loss and service outage. If any email look suspicious the employees are asked to deleted it and contact Resolution Center for assistance.

There have recently been a lot of computer virus attacks. New viruses are a serious threat to Enron's computing environment. Employees are urged to make sure their machines are virus-free. No unsolicited files should ever be opened/launched. A key element of a virus attack is the innocent nature of its delivery. Viruses cause significant data loss and service outage. If a file looks suspicious, it should be deleted or sent to Resolution Center.

The sender was impressed by the IBI presentation. The presentation could help in the creation and management of master swap agreements. The sender talk to the confirm desk personal to talk the issues they need the system to address. The personal have the concept of a data dictionary that is central to the creation of confirmations and agreements. they were asked to make a presentation with areas of concern in the database before June.

The sender is impressed by the IPI presentation. Although it was more directed to the confirmation process, but it could also help in the creation and management of master swap agreements and agreement form templates. The 'data dictionary' concept, in particular, is central to the creation of confirmations and agreements. The sender asked them to prepare another presentation that specifically addresses these issues and come back before June.

Enron is a member of the Pacific Gas and Electric Company bankruptcy case. Enron's designated committee members are Michael Tribolet and Lisa Mellencamp. They will be restricted from disclosing information. Attached is the Ethical Wall Procedure regarding the information that Enron will received as a member. They asked that the procedure should be read and a Employee Certification must be signed and returned to the Compliance Department.

Enron is a member of the Official Unsecured Creditors' Committee appointed in the Pacific Gas and Electric Company bankruptcy case. Michael Tribolet is Enron's representative on the committee. He is not allowed to disclose certain information he receives. Attached are Ethical Wall Procedures on confidential information. The receiver is urged to read them and print, sign and return the attached Employee Certification to the Compliance Department.

The sender received a call about mtr 5999. A portion of the gas will be delivered into Midcon instead of HPL. For HPL the nomination will be 11,300/d from the 10th until the rest of the month, and Jill priced at Gas Daily. The sender change the deal #278748 accordingly. There is no mark-to-market impact, and the flow need review to adjust if necessary.

Jill Zively called the sender about their supply at mtr 5999. Late Friday night (6/9) a part of this gas goes into Midcon instead of HPL. The nomination into HPL for the 10th through the rest of the month is 11300/d. Jill priced the deal at Gas Daily, so there is no mark-to-market impact. The sender accordingly changed deal #278748 for Saturday forward. They will review the flows next week to see how much the volume changes and adjust if needed.

The sender is exposing arguments to Page. The sender estates that a commodity forward contract is not similar to a net settlement, so she suggest is not necessary a settlement. Also an event of default and resulting termination of a commodity contract can have negative consequences even beyond the terms of the contract.

The sender asks Paige if (s)he should use more argumentative language, because (s)he thinks it will not make much difference in the outcome. The current language argues that Statement 133 in the commodity forward contract is not correctly applied, and that an event of default and resulting termination of a commodity contract can have far-reaching negative implications for the defaulting party well beyond the terms of the contract itself.

The sender has some questions from the Products Control Group that will be managing Online Trading HelpDesk. The first is about listen in periodically customer phone calls between the HelpDesk and customers to ensure 'quality control'. If that is something that is going to be done, they need to work with and outside counsel Sullivan Cromwell.

Mark Taylor got a list of questions on Online Trading issues from the Products Control Group - the group that will manage the Online Trading HelpDesk. One of their questions is related to the ability of HelpDesk managers to periodically listen in on phone calls with the customers to ensure 'quality control' over the responses given to them. Should it be done with an explicit announcement that says the calls may be monitored from time to time?

The sender is asking Jeff to provide a list of issues and background material to Mark for the meeting with Commissioner Newsome and Congressman Stenholm. The sender prepared a draft of the list. Jeff should review the draft and sent it to Mark along with the itineraries.

In preparation for his meetings with Commissioner Newsome and Congressman Stenholm, Mark H. has asked for a bullet point list of Enron's key issues and any appropriate background material. The sender has prepared a draft issues list (attached) which (s)he wishes Jeff to look over and see if there is anything he thinks should be added. They can then forward it on to Mark. Mark will probably also need the final itineraries.

Enron employees can receive Metro 30 day Zone Pass if not participating in contract parking. New passes will be available upon expiration of the 30 day period. There are 4 zones and each pass is valid for unlimited rides. Each zone have different fare values, any traveler who travels to a higher-cost zone should pay in cash the difference. The passes are available at the Parking and Transportation Desk.

Enron employees not participating in contract parking are eligible to receive Metro Bus Passes or Woodlands Express Passes. The passes are available at the Parking Transportation Desk on Level 3 of the Enron Building, from 8:30 AM to 4:30 PM. All Metro passes are Metro 30 Day Zone Pass. Bus service is divided into four zones with unlimited rides. The zone pass is time-activated, and new passes will be available upon expiration of old ones.

The sender is presenting a draft of the GTC's , the documents have been expanded to include European transaction, and allow multiple or single weather stations deals. The commercial people is needed to see the forms and agree on them. The sender is going to sit down with Mark Dilworth to complete descriptions for the form, some have been included in the web. There are blanks for the European deals.

Attached are draft versions of the weather GTC's. The documents have been expanded to allow for European as well as US transactions and for multiple as well as single weather station deals. The put or call has to be specified on the website. A weather commercial people should look this over. The sender will discuss the long descriptions with Mark Dilworth. These are not ready to be uploaded to the system. There are blanks for weather agencies.

The sender stresses the necessity to coordinate with Legal if any restriction that has been placed by Legal should be waived or not. The New York Times Company cannot trade derivatives, and trades only by telephone. San Diego Gas and electric Company cannot trade derivatives either. Aspect Resources can enter derivatives transactions. Brant-Allen Industries is shut down for financial trading. Cox Perkins don't want to trade anymore.

The sender has comments on six counterparties. The New York Times cannot trade derivatives online. San Diego Gas Electric Company cannot enter into derivatives transactions. Aspect Resources can enter into derivative transactions. Brant-Allen Industries is shut down for all financial trading. Cox Perkins does not want to trade with Enron anymore. Trade should not continue with Sonoco Products until the payment dispute is resolved.

The sender is updating the status of the signing between Enron and Duke. As of Friday, Duke singed all documents but requested an additional guaranty certificate from Enron Corp, represented by Clement Abrams. Clement is preparing the certificate addressing the concerns. He will get it signed and give the original to be sent to transmittal.

As of Friday, Duke had apparently signed their documents but did not fax them over because they did not like the certificate Enron provided with respect to the guaranty. Clement Abrams, Enron's lawyer, spoke to Duke's lawyer this morning and is preparing an additional certificate that should address their concerns. He will get it signed, fax it directly to them, and give the sender the original for transmittal.

The sender is telling Chris that after calling him, he/she will not be at her/his other desk. She called to thank the goody package that contained a golf shirt for Hector, a pen and a pencil. The sender is going to New York to meet with some customers.

The sender called Chris a while ago and they said he would call the sender back. But she may not be at her phone when Chris calls back. She will be at her other desk for the rest of the afternoon. She wants to thank Chris for the goody package he sent. Hector likes his golf shirt and her pen and pencil are very nice. She already tested them both. She will be visiting the New York customers this week and will take the new pen and pencil with her.

The sender was asked by Michael Corbally to confirm the address of Meteo France. Previously the address listed on the Datasources was at a Paris address, but earlier this year they used a Toulouse address. The address that is going to be set as the standard address is Paris.

Michael Corbally wanted the sender to confirm an address with the receiver. Per the list of Datasources the receiver sent, Meteo France is listed at their Paris address, but they had a confirm earlier this year using Meteo France at their Toulouse address. Michael wants to confirm that the standard address will be Meteo France out of Paris, not Toulouse.

The sender is excited about the BVI which is only 5 weeks away. He/She has a NYV trip for a conference and want to know if friends can join him for dinner Sunday 31st. He/She just finish paying for a boat. Also some arrangement have been made for the friends at a hotel for the 20th. The listed of beverages has fax to them too.

The sender is very excited about the BVI. It is only 5 weeks away. It helps keep his/her mind off the stock market roller-coaster. (S)he is coming to NYC for a conference in 2 weeks. Are the receivers free for dinner on Sunday the 31st? They also need to talk about the final payment on the boat. Have the receivers made their own hotel arrangements? If not, there is still a room reserved for them for the night of 20th. T. has sent his/her regards.

The sender is mailing tickets to Susan for a trip to Korea. She also is telling her what to bring in the trip and how to dress. Also is telling her that she shouldn't worry about cash, there is an ATM free of charge, and some places with good rates. There is also a DMZ tour that Susan can take with them. The sender advises to pack light and bring and extra suitcase in case Susan wants some pottery.

Susan's tickets were mailed today, and should reach her in 7-10 days. The sender explains her itinerary, and mentions that the weather is hot and humid, much like Houston. Comfortable outfit and running shoes will be good. There is an ATM free of charge, so Susan should not bother about cash. They can also cash a check for up to $300/day. Light packing and an extra suitcase will be good. There are DMZ tours on the 18th, 21st, 23rd, and 25th.

The sender is validating how traders access the system when it goes live. To make sure the Stack Managers are opening the correct database, they need to response how they access. There are two ways one through Terminal Server and the other by opening the system from a 'native' desktop. If they are not sure, they should contact the sender or Teresa Mandola or Jennifer McQuade for help.

The process of confirming all traders are set up correctly and ready to trade, is on. It is to be ensured that Stack Managers are accessing the correct database. The Stack Manager can either be accessed through Terminal Server, or by opening it directly from the 'native' desktop. The receivers are requested to correspondingly reply with either a '1' or a '2' in the subject field. Inquiries should be directed to Teresa Mandola or Jennifer McQuade.

The sender is requesting Sandra for a letter of recommendation. The sender was given a pink slip from EnergyUSA and is looking for another job. He/She regrets leaving Enron in search of stability. He/She still have some months before the house is finished.

The sender greets Sandra and hopes her life will be better soon. Since most of EnergyUSA was given pink slips effective over the next 3-6 months, the sender is looking for another job. He requests Sandra to write a letter of recommendation for him, regrets taking this leave from Enron, and admits that he landed into this trouble in his quest to look for a stable job. But at least he has a few months before his house is finished.

For all participants in the Enron Corp. Savings Plan, the plans is moving to a new administrator, the transition period is scheduled from october 26 to November 20. The company has been working with Hewitt and Northern Trust since July. They are asking participants to review very carefully their long-term financial goals, and to carefully weigh the potential and risk of each investment choice. All trades need to be complete before the transition

Participants in the Enron Savings Plan are informed of an upcoming transition period scheduled at 3 PM CST on October 26. Enron is working with Hewitt and Northern Trust to make this period as short as possible. Enron Savings Plan will continue to offer several investment opportunities with different levels of risk. It is critical that all trades among investment funds be completed by 3 PM CST on October 26 before the transition period starts.

The sender wants to know details of Cronhusker. 1) Who will handle accounting and reporting? Is someone from Legal assigned for ENA?. Tenaske let them know that they should pay for July and August activity, which seems they are not prepared to do until september.

The sender asked a few questions related to Cornhusker. Who will handle the financial accounting and reporting for these deals? Is someone in Legal currently assigning the contracts to ENA? What is the name of the company purchasing the supply/fuel at the plant? Is it true that Enron is supposed to pay the suppliers and the pipeline for July and August activity, as Tenaska said? Should these deals be in an accrual or MTM book?

The Industrial Master has been modified based on the changes of the ISDA. Paul mentioned that the receiver is using the Industrial form for Norway. And the sender is suggesting if that is the case all the changes should be included.

More or less the same changes were made to the Industrial Master as the ones to the ISDA. The receiver should update that form to include the changes, if (s)he is using it. Paul mentioned in his presentation at the seminar that the receiver was using the Industrial as the basis form for Norway. If that is the case, then the sender may need to look into that form. The sender missed the receiver at the seminar, and hopes to see him/her soon.

The confidentiality language does not allow to give the agreement to affiliates without consent, it was revised to broaden 9 months ago. Duke is an old master and they need the sender's consent. If Federico agrees, a draft of the waiver can be elaborate and send to Duke.

Enron's confidentiality language was so limited that it did not allow them to provide the agreement to affiliates of either party without consent. They revised the form about 9 months ago to broaden the language to include affiliates, but Duke is an old player, so they need Enron's consent to provide it to their affiliate. Unless Federico has any reason not to waive the language, they should draft a waiver as soon as possible and send it to Duke.

The sender is providing a list of accomplishments to BH. The sender spent time learning to trade Waha and now he /she concentrates on operations. He/She is expecting to hire an additional person, so more results can be presented to BH.

The sender could not get the list to BH last night, since (s)he left office early. The list is pretty slim. (S)he spent a lot of time trying to learn how to trade Waha, so it was not possible for her to produce much results for BH. But (s)he hopes that concentrating just on operations and hiring an additional person will solve all this. (S)he would like to have BH's comments on his/her list of accomplishments.
The sender is contacting Rob, through Doug Leach, because Rudolph Maldonado wants to sell natural gas in Saudi Arabia. The sender is giving Rob all the contact information to check it out.

Doug Leach mentioned Rob's name to the sender. Doug thinks Rob would be the best person to talk to about this. The sender got a call last night from Rudolph Maldonado. He stated that he has some natural gas to sell in Saudi Arabia, and his number is 562-866-1755. The sender requests Rob to give Rudolph a call and check it out. The sender told Rudolph that (s)he would find him someone that he could discuss this with. The sender's number is 3-6905.

The sender is trying to track down the author of an ISDA Schedule with document number LN1: #20030058v5. Mark needs the computer document to do a blackline against another agreement. Mark Taylor has been contacted but she is not responding. The sender thinks that the document was prepared by on of the lawyers of the receiver.

The sender requests the receiver to track down in London the author of an ISDA Schedule on the ECT-ETOL Trust deal. The top of the Schedule says 'Milbank Draft' and the document # on the bottom says LN1: #20030058v5. Robina Barker-Bennett in Treasury left Mark Taylor an email about this, and the sender left her a voicemail to track down the document, but has not heard back. (S)he thinks the document was prepared by one of the receiver's lawyers.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: deal between ECT and the ETOL Trust

annotation.abstractive: The sender is providing contracts to be used for the online system. The contracts are not up to date and some minor modifications are expected. The PA is the only document signed by pen with a prospective counterpart. The Electronic Trading Agreement is accepted at the first log on the system. If there is no master then GTC's are the contractual terms. The credit group asked for a creditworthy and less creditworthy counterpart list.

Several contracts are attached, to be used for the online system. They are not final, but the changes will not be significant. "PA" is the Password Application - the only document a prospective counterparty actually signs. The first time a counterparty logs on to the system with its approved password, it is required to agree to the ETA by clicking on an 'I Agree' box. GTC's are the contractual terms applied to online transactions sans a master.

The sender is requesting a list of 5 priorities of each area, and also top 8-10 priorities for the entire group. Additionally a brief description of each priority with an attempt to quantify potentially value or loss of value avoided.

The sender wants the receivers to send him/her a list of top 5 priorities in each area by May 18, and if possible, a consensus document with top 8-10 priorities for the entire group. A brief description should accompany each of the priorities, and it should attempt to quantify, wherever possible, the value associated with each of the priorities - either value potentially created or loss of value avoided.

There are $21.4 millions reserved for a potential Northwest refund. Different companies filed claims at FERC for $100 million refund from EPMI. FERC began an investigation into unreasonable spot prices in northwest from December 2000 to June 2001. Consultants from Charles River Associates were hired for the case. Te litigation team informed about a $30 million realistic potential refund. A Judge drafted a decision to FERC against the refund.

$21.4 M is reserved for Northwest refunds, $10 M is in LTCA book and $11.4 M is in LTNW book. FERC started investigation into unjust and unreasonable spot prices in Northwest from December 2000 to June 2001. Seattle City Light, Tacoma City Light, Eugene Water and Electric Board, and Sacramento Municipal Utility District filed claims at FERC, totaling $100 M. Many claims are spurious. If a draft decision is approved, these reserves may be removed.
The brokers have not received any notification on the name change. Causing some NYMEX trades been cleared. The sender needs to know when is the notification going to be sent to the brokers.

Calls are pouring in from the brokers and the NYMEX saying that the brokers are yet to receive notification of the name change. This is causing problems with clearing the trades on the NYMEX. The sender left the receiver a voicemail several weeks ago, and it seems the receiver and his/her desk are the point of communication with the brokers. The sender asks the receiver to get the notice of the name change out to the brokers as soon as possible.

The sender wants to know if Yao is going to be in London on Saturday because he/she is going. The sender is working on identifying what can be trade with potential commodity counterparty. The sender wants to know if Yao remembers negotiating any master agreement for ECT that did not contain the necessary elements for trading derivatives, for example an exemption representations or the commodity derivatives definitions provisions.

The sender is going to London on Saturday, and asks if Yao will also be there. They are getting set up to trade energy commodities and derivatives online and figuring out what to trade with potential counterparties. Does Yao remember negotiating any master agreement for ECT without the necessary elements for trading energy commodity derivatives, e.g., trade option exemption representations and commodity derivatives definitions provisions?

The online trading program will begin by the end of the month. Some modifications to the Master Swap Agreement Database are needed, make it accesible to any ECT, ECT Canada and ECT International.
