With the exception of the Legal and Credit comment section that needs to remain limited to Legal and Credit. Also Portland General masters should only be available for Legal and Credit. A drop down is needed to deal with online trading issues.

Online trading and other issues warrant modifications to Master Swap Agreement Database. It should be open to any ECT, ECT Canada or ECT International employee, including London, Oslo, Singapore, Portland and Buenos Aires offices. Legal and Credit comment section will be restricted. Legal and Credit should access the Portland General masters. Dropdowns need to be added for online trading by the end of the month. The sender wants more discussions.

Enron is making an statement about the tragedy of September 11. Nick Humber from Enron Wind was on one of the planes hijacked. Enron is donating $1 million to the cause, and matching the employees donations 2 to 1 on all different raising efforts. Also, Enron is encouraging employees to take time to find a place of worship to pray for the victims and survivors. Counselor services for members and families are available in multiple ways.

The sender describes in detail the impacts of September 11 attack, gives clear instructions on the duties of Enron employees in its aftermath, sympathizes with the family of Enron employee Nick Humber, announces donation amounts, matching employee donation policies, prayer services, memorial services, blood donation camps, a citywide candlelight vigil with mayor Lee Brown speaking, a moment of silence on September 17, and counseling services.

The sender is recommending contractor Louis Fernandez. His work is top notch, and his subcontractors work was great. Louis is also a good business man, giving a good description of the worked done on every week bill. He is honest about the time of reparations, and communicates well about any change and how it will impact the cost.

The sender highly recommends Louis Fernandez. His work was top notch, his subcontractors did a great job, and he is a very good businessman. He gives a weekly bill spelling out the exact number of hours he or his subcontractors worked and listing any supplies he was billing for. Louis is honest about the time it will take to do a job, and communicates when he has a problem and how that might affect the cost. The sender thinks Louis will be ideal.

The sender has been working on upgrading the Master Swap Agreement database. Soon this database will be available for access to anyone. Also a drop down for 'approved for online trading' will be available to confirm the information at all times. Other groups will be able to seeing financial contacts as well. The prototype will be done by the end of the week.

The sender already approved them for trading without restrictions. Getting the signed master in meant that the confirmations now took a different path. He is working with the Lotus Notes people in upgrading the current Master Swap Agreement database. Once it is done, it will be open view access to all. He is adding dropdowns for 'approved for online trading' to confirm the approvals. His prototype will be done by the end of the week.

The sender requested Documentum to do a demostration. The sender was not able to get in contact with someone appropriate to talk about the software. Contacted only marketing people. The sender also talks about designing the software with Mark. He/She also likes IPI, and he is interested on buying a document creation software. Apparently, the contact was condescending with the sender about affording their services.

The sender is still trying to get Documentum to do a demonstration for him. The general marketing people speaks a different language, and it has not been very fruitful to interact with them. One person was a little condescending about price. The sender told them to check the Enron webpage to get more information, but it appears they did not do that. They will lose his business. In the end, he and Mark will design their own software.

The sender is letting John know about the latest action with El Paso. The sender met with El Paso's commercial team, after signing a confidentiality agreement they received around 80 project documents. After the meeting they exchange some emails. A site visit is scheduled for Nov 28th. They are waiting on El Paso to discuss specific issues.

The sender gives John an update on the actions taken with El Paso. A full briefing was given, a confidentiality agreement was signed, and a full data-room disk with 80 project documents was delivered. A follow-up email was sent with two additional documents completed in the interim. A site visit was scheduled for November 28. Further requests from El Paso are currently being awaited to schedule conference calls to address specific issues.

The sender wants to remark the importance of achieving a robust competition on power markets to ensure electricity is delivered to where is most needed. The administration will work with Federal Energy Regulatory Commission FERC to exercise jurisdiction over electricity commerce.

To achieve competition in wholesale power markets and to ensure that electricity can move effectively from where it is produced to where it is most needed, this Administration will strongly encourage the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to actively exercise jurisdiction over all aspects of electricity transmission in interstate commerce. This jurisdiction must also be extended by Congress to cover non-FERC power authorities.

The sender is asking Vince to help find a contact in the Woodlands School System. Even though his wife could find a job in the Houston district, they want a teaching job for her in the Woodlands area. He is also attaching his wife's resume.

The sender asks a favor of Vince. He and his wife have been living in The Woodlands for about a month. They have tried, to no avail, to get her in the local school district as a speech pathologist or a K-6 grade school teacher. Although she can find a teaching job in the Houston Independent School District, he prefers that she taught locally, in The Woodlands. Does Vince know of anyone they can contact to get her in The Woodlands School System?

The sender is writing to Sandra to let her know that he/she is leaving Prebon as of January 15th. The sender has few options for a future job, in a bank, consulting firms and some energy companies. He/She has three 5 year old boys. The sender has the best wishes for Sandra.

The sender hopes Sandra had a nice Christmas and a fun holiday season. She is leaving Prebon on January 15. She has spent the last 8 years of her 16 years in the Energy field with Prebon. They part on the best of terms. She is talking with a few banks, a consulting firm and some energy companies, but also plans on spending some time with the family. She will let Sandra know when and where she decides to go, and wishes her and Kenny best of luck.

The sender is letting John and Louise know about the status of Sundance B PPA. Last week they received consent to have PPA split into two from TransAlta and the Balancing Pool. The enabling regulation will be passed by Government the week of November 12, the split will be effective as of that date. Don Miller and his team are prepared to contact the identified clients and initiate process. A complete timeline will be sent shortly.

The sender updates John and Louise on the status of the Sundance B PPA. They received the necessary consents to split the PPA into two from both TransAlta and the Balancing Pool last week, and expect the regulation enabling the split to be passed by the Government during the week of November 12. Don Miller and his team are prepared to smile and dial on October 29, thereby contacting the list of identified customers and initiating the process.

keyword_keyphrase.keyword: status of the Sundance B PPA

annotation.abstractive: Due to an error while processing the information to Enron Corp, a number of active employees were coded as terminated on the Savings Plan system. Therefore, the administrator, Hewitt Associates, sent notifications to terminated employees. The messages is asking current employees to disregard this erroneous message. To verify the Saving plan the can log on to their accounts using the intranet service or the internet. The error has been corrected.

Due to an Enron programming error in the transmission of data to the Enron Corp. Savings Plan administrator, a number of currently active employees were erroneously coded with a status of "terminated" on the Savings Plan system. As a result, Hewitt Associates sent them a termination notice. This notice was sent in error, and should be ignored. The situation was identified and corrected. The sender regrets any confusion or inconvenience caused.

The sender is writing to John about his/her situation with Enron. He wants to state 4 points. First he/she never falter from the highest ethical standard. Second, have Enron address its misrepresentation made prior to 2001. Third he/she is fully prepared to accept zero performance bonus. Last, He/She kept working diligently despite of the zero bonus. He is requesting a solution from Enron and asks Jonh's consideration.

The sender understands that John is under a lot of stress solving problems created by others, and also balancing work and family. But he also points out that deliberate misrepresentation of facts, e.g., the restatement of earnings and balance sheet items took the court of public opinion by storm. He never faltered from the highest ethical standard, and is prepared to accept zero performance bonus for this year. He will await John's reply on this.
